Translations.Text: Ëm
Tarusi n Tezmamt s$uô Öebbi, Uzmir, Bab n ûûwab
Ur Nexliq tamurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen, siwa s tidep, ar lajel ipwassnen. Wid ijehlen numren ayen u$uô pwanedôen

Ini: "day ur twalam ara wigi u$uô la tepnujum, war Öebbi? Sseknet iyi d, d acu xelqen si tmurt, ne$ ma sâan amur deg igenwan? Awit iyi d tazmamt id izwaren tagi, ne$ lateô n tmusni, ma tessawalem tidep
Anwa innetlafen sennig wid ipnujun, war Öebbi, $eô wayen ur asen d nepparra, ar ass n tnekra, u nitni stehzan deg unuju nnsen
Mara twafesrem imdanen, ad ilin d icenga nnsen, ad skiddben aâbad nnsen
Ma $ôan asen issekniyen nne£ iberrzen, wid iugin tidep, mi ten id tusa, ad inin: "wagi d ssêur n ûûeê

Ne$ ad inin: "isnulfa t id". Ini: "lemmer it id snulfa$, ur tezmirem ad iyi tsellkem, s wacemma, si Öebbi. Neppa, Yif akw akken Issen, acu têekkum fellas. Iqadd Neppa d Anagi gari yidwen. Neppa, Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu
Ini: "ur lli$, ger imazanen, d win id isnulfuyen. Ur éôi$ acu ara ivôun yidi, ne$ yidwen. La îîafaôe$, kan, ayen iyi d ippuweêêan. Aql i, kan, nek, d aneddaô ipbegginen
Ini: "meyyzet ma, ayagi, s$uô Öebbi, u tnekôem t? Icehhed unagi n At Isôail, $ef lmetl is, d$a iumen. Tesme$wrem iman nnwen". Ih, Öebbi ur Inehhu agdud imednas
Nnan wid ijehlen, i wid iumnen: "lemmer d ayen ilhan, ur a$ zeggwiren $uôes". Imi ur pwanhan ara syis, qqaôen: "ayagi d tikerkas n zik
Uqbel is, Tazmamt n Musa, d nnhaya u d aêunu. Tagi d Tazmamt itebbiten, s wawalen n taâôabt, a ppendeô wid idensen, a ppessefôeê lâuûam
Ih, wid iqqaôen: "Mass nne$ d Öebbi, d$a îfen degs, ur ppagaden, ur $weblen
Widak d at Loennet, degs ad wekkôen, d arraz n wayen xeddmen

Nweûûa amdan ar lewqama s imawlan is. Imma s temêen s tadist, temêen di tinnufra. Ger tadist akked ujumi, caret wagguren. Armi ibbwev d anqaqôi, issawev kuéet isegwasen, inna: "a Mass iw! Eoo iyi a K snemmre$ af l$it i $ T$atev, nek akked lwaldin iw; ad xedme$ ayen ilhan ara K iôavin. Efk iyi d tarwa ilhan. Aql i utube$ K, aql i seg imvuâen
£uô wigi, Nqebbel lmefruz igiten nnsen, a Nessuref i tucmitin nnsen, ger at Loennet; d lemâahda n tidep, i sen ippuwaââden

Win innan i imawlan is: "tfuh nnwen! Day yi tâahdem a d kkre$? Ni$ âaddan isuta uqbel i". Nitni teppren tacvaî n Öebbi: "a ssexv ik, amen! Ih, lmâahda n Öebbi, d tidep". A d yini: "ayagi, siwa tiêkayin imezwura
D wigi i$ef iûaô wawal iaânan leoyus n leonun akked yimdanen, i ten id izwaren. Ih, nitni d imexsuôen
I akw tiseddarin n wayen xedmen, iwakken ad yili warraz igiten nnsen. Nitni ur pwadensen

Ass ideg ara kecmen ar tmes, wid ijehlen: "tvegâam tiéidanin i s tezham, di tmeddurt nnwen di ddunit. Assa, a ppeppuqeîîim s uâaqeb isdullun, imi tessem$waôem iman nnwen di tmurt, ur teklalem; imi tellam tbe$wlem
Mmekti d agmat n Âad, mi indeô agdud is deg igidan, u, s tidep, âaddan d ineddaôen zdat es, u zdeffir es: "siwa Öebbi ara tâabdem. Nek ugade$, fellawen, aâaqeb n wass abarar
Nnan d: "day a$ d tusiv, ad a$ tfaôqev akked iôebbiten nne$? Awi a$ d ayen i$ef la $ tessagwadev, ma tessawalev tidep
Inna: "tamusni ar Öebbi kan. Ssawve$ awen ayen i$ef id ppuceggâa$. Maca, wala$ kwen d agdud ur nessin
Mi t walan d asigna id ileêêun ar t$wezza nnsen, nnan: "wagi d asigna ar a$ d iawin ageffur". Xaîi! D ayen i$ef têarem, d avu, degs aâaqeb aqeôêan
ad isqucc yal cci, s lameô n Mass is. Gwran d ur tepwaliv siwa ixxamen nnsen. Akka i Nepqeîîi igduden ibe$wviyen

Ni$ Nessakrer asen ayen ur awen Nessakrer. Nefka yasen imeééu$en, allen, akked wulawen. Ula i sen d bbwin deg wacemma imeééu$en, allen, akked wulawen, mi skaddben issekniyen n Öebbi. Ayen i$ef ttihin, izzi d fellasen
Ni$ nessenger akw timdinin i wen d izzin, u Nenewwel asent issekniyen, amar a d u$alent s abrid
Acimi ur ten sellken ara wid rran d iôebbiten iééaéan, war Öebbi? Xaîi! Ooan ten. D ayagi ay d tikerkas nnsen, u d wayen id snulfuyen
Mi k ed Nebbwi agraw n leonun, ad ssemêessen i Leqwôan; mi s êedôen, nnan: "êesset"! Mi ifukk, u$alen s agdud nnsen d ineddaôen
Nnan: "a yagdud nne$, aql a$ nesla i Tezmamt id irsen, deffir Musa, id itebbten ayen ip id izwaren, i inehhun ar tidep akked ubrid uwqim
A yagdud nne$, erret awal i uberraê n Öebbi, amnet yiS, ad awen Isemmeê seg ibekkaven nnwen, a kwen Isellek seg uâaqeb aqeôêan
Win isâaweégen i uberraê n Öebbi, ur ipsellik di tmurt, ur ippaf imawlan, war Neppa. Widak di ttelfan n ûûeê
Day ur walan ara ar Öebbi d Win Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan, ur Ifcil seg uxlaq nnsen? Izmer a d Issider lmeggtin. Ih, Neppa Izmer i yal cci
Ass ideg ara d rsen, ar tmes, wid ijehlen: "maççi s tidep ayagi"? A d inin: "ih, s Mass nne$"! A d Yini: "jeôôbet aâaqeb $ef wayen la tnekôem
Eûbeô akken ûebôen wid iôeûmen seg imazanen. I nitni, ur p$awal. Ass ideg ara walin acu i sen ippuwaââden, amzun ur kminen siwa saâa n wass. D aberreê: "anwa ara ipwakksen, siwa agdud icemten
Wid ijehlen, u ssefôa$en abrid n Öebbi, Itlef igiten nnsen
Wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, umnen s wayen id irsen ar Muêemmed, u neppa d tidep s$uô Mass nnsen; Issemsa yasen tucmitin nnsen, Iûeggem asen lêala nnsen
Ayagi, acku wid ijehlen îîafaôen tikerkas; ma d wid iumnen, îîafaôen tidep n Mass nnsen. Akka id Ippak Öebbi imedyaten nnsen i imdanen

Mara d temlilem akked wid ijehlen, ewwtet ar tmegrav ar ten t$elbem. Arzet pen nezzeh. Sinna, d aserreê ne$ d feddu, alamma isers îôad tiâekkwmin is. Akka, lemmer i S ihwi i Öebbi, yili I$leb iten, maca a kwen Ijeôôeb, kra s kra. Wid ipwan$an deg ubrid n Öebbi, ur pôuêun igiten nnsen, d awez$i
A ten Inhu, ad Iûeggem lêala nnsen
A ten Issekcem di Loennet i sen Imla
A wid iumnen! Ma tefkam afus i Öebbi, ad awen Ifk afus, ad awen itebbet isurifen
Wid ijehlen, ay amxix nnsen, ad weddôen igiten nnsen
Ayagi, acku ugwin ayen id Issers Öebbi; ihi, Imêa igiten nnsen
Aâni ur nudan ara tamurt, ad walin amek tevôa d imezwura nnsen? Issexv iten Öebbi. Am akka i ijehliyen
Ayagi, acku Öebbi d bab n wid iumnen. Ijehliyen, ur asen illi bab
Ih, Öebbi ad Issekcem wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, di leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen. Wid ijehlen zehhun, teppen akken itepp lmal. D times ay d leqôaô nnsen
Acêal n at temdinin i yifen, di tezmert, tamdint i k id iéâan! Nesqucc iten, ur asen illi useîîaô
Day win illan ar ubeggen n Mass is, am win, iwumi ppucebbêen yir igiten is, u iîîafaôen chawi nnsen

Amek tga Loennet i ippuwaââden i wid ipêezziben: degs isaffen n waman ur nxeppeô, isaffen n yi$i ur tfessed lbenna s, isaffen n ccôab aéidan i wid itessen, isaffen n tament ippuneqqan. Degs, i nitni, yal ppemôa, akked ssmaê n Mass nnsen. Day am wid iwekkôen di tmes; sswan ten s waman ippayzagen, ara icergen afwad nnsen
Llan garasen wid i k issemêasen. Sifat ff$en d s$uôek, ad inin i wid iwumi teppunefk tmusni: "d acu id inna kan, llinna"? Wigi d wid iwumi Isle$ Öebbi ulawen, teddun kan d chawi nnsen
Wid ipwanhan, Irna asen nnhaya, Ifka yasen aêezzeb nnsen
Day la pôaoun kan imir, a ten id ias, deqzalla? Ni$ usant ed licaôat is. Ma iusa d $uôsen, iwumi t usmekti nnsen
Cfu ar, s tidep, ur illi ôebbi siwa Öebbi; ssuter ssmaê ubekkav ik, akked wid n lmumnin, argaz tameîîut. Öebbi Iéôa anda têebkem, akked wanda tberrkem
La qqaôen wid iumnen: "a lemmer a d ters tsuôep"! Maca, mi d ters tsuôep tuêkimt, ideg id ipwader umennu$, a pwaliv at wul iblan, la k id pmuqulen s tiî n win tessexcawat tmeppant. Yif it i nitni
wannuz, akked wawal uwqim. Mi ipwagzem ôôay, ma ssawlen tidep ar Öebbi yif it i nitni
Day maççi, ma twexxôem, ahat a ppesfesdem tamurt, a pfaôqem alag nnwen
Wigi d wid i Ixza Öebbi; Isgugem iten, Isder$el iéôi nnsen
Day ur pmeyyizen ara Leqwôan, ne$ u$alent tsergal $ef wulawen
Ih, wid ixedâan, deffir ubeggen n nnhaya $uôsen, ikellex iten Cciîan. Iooa ten tallit
Ayagi, acku nitni nnan i wid iugin ayen d Issader Öebbi: "ad awen na$ awal di kra n lumuô". Öebbi Iéôa lesrar nnsen
Amek ihi, ma ddment lmalayek leôwaê nnsen, la ten kkatent ar udmawen nnsen, iârar nnsen
Akka, ihi, ddan akked wayen isserfayen Öebbi. Ugin llza S. D$a Isseôxes igiten nnsen
Ne$ $ilen at wul amehzul, ard awez$i, ur d Issuffu$ ara Öebbi leb$wev nnsen
Lemmer i £ ihwi, ad ak ten id Nessken, war ccekk, a ten tâaqlev ar udem nnsen, a ten tâaqlev ar ûûenf umeslay. Öebbi Issen igiten nnwen
S tidep, a kwen Njeôôeb, alamma Nessen imjuhad, akked iûebôiyen, segwen. A Njeôôeb isallen nnwen
Ih, wid ijehlen, issefôa$en abrid n Öebbi, i inuqmen Amazan, deffir ubeggen n nnhaya $uôsen, ur vuôôen Öebbi s wacemma. Ad Isseôxes igiten nnsen
A wid iumnen! A$et awal i Öebbi, a$et awal i Umazan, ur ssiôxiset igiten nnwen
Ih, wid ijehlen, issefôa$en abrid n Öebbi, sinna, mmuten d ijehliyen, war ccekk, ur sen Ipsemmiê Öebbi, d awez$i
Ur ppiôhifet, ur ssuturet tifrat, mara tilim d ine$laben! U Öebbi yidwen, ur kwen Ipêewwio, d awez$i, seg igiten nnwen
Tameddurt di ddunit, d urar kan, akked lhawiyya. Ma tumnem u têezbem, ad awen d Ifk arrazen nnwen. Ur awen issutur ayla nnwen
Ma Issuter awen t, a kwen Icebbwel, a pcuêêem, a d iffe$ leb$wev nnwen

D kunwi i ipwanecden a pseddqem deg ubrid n Öebbi. Llan degwen wid ipcuêêun. Win ipcuêêun, ipcuêêu kan $ef yiman is. Öebbi d Asâay, kunwi d igellilen. Ma twexxôem, a kwen Ineûûef s ugdud ur nelli segwen. D$a ur ppemcabin $uôwen
Ih, Nefya yak l$elb iberrzen
iwakken ad Isemmeê Öebbi ibekkaven ik id izwaren akked wid igwran. Ad ak Itim l$it iS, a k Iawi d ubrid uwqim
A k Iall Öebbi tallalt tuzmirt
D Neppa id Issersen talwit deg ulawen n lmumnin, iwakken ad yim$uô liman nnsen. N Öebbi Iâsekôiwen n tmurt akked igenwan. Öebbi Izga Iééeô, d Bab n ûûwab
Iwakken ad Issekcem wid akked tid iumnen, ar leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen, degsen ad wekkôen. Ad asen Issemsu tucmitin nnsen. D wagi, ar Öebbi, ay d rrbeê abarar
Ad Iâaqeb ixabiten, tixabitin, imcurak, timcurak, wid id ipfekkiôen Öebbi yir afekkeô. Izzi yasen ddens. Irfa Öebbi fellasen, Ixza ten. Ihegga yasen d Loahennama. A tu$alin tucmip
N Öebbi iâsekôiwen n tmurt akked igenwan. Öebbi Izga d Uzmir, d Bab n ûûwab
Ih, Nuzen ik id d anagi, d abcir, d aneddaô
iwakken a ppamnem s Öebbi akked Umazan iS, a T kfum, ad aS tanzem, a T tesbuccuâem taûebêit, tameddit
Wid iâaqden yidek âaqden kan d Öebbi. Afus n Öebbi nnig ufus nnsen. Win iêenten, d imanis kan i isseênet. Win iîîfen deg wayen i$ef iâuhed Öebbi, ad as Ifk arraz abarar

Ad ak inin wid igwran, seg uâôaben n ucluê: "i $ ice$wlen, d ayla nne$ akked twaculin nne$. Ssuter a neppusemmeê". Qqaôen s yilsawen nnsen, ayen ur nelli deg ulawen nnsen. Ini: "anwa ara kwen iselken si Öebbi, s wacemma, ma Ib$a yawen vveôô, ne$ ma Ib$a yawen aba$uô? Xaîi, Izga Öebbi Ippuxebbeô af wayen txeddmem
Xaîi, t$ilem Amazan akked lmumnin ur d ppu$alen ara, d awez$i, ar twaculin nnsen. Ayagi, issefôeê ulawen nnwen. Nnwaya nnwen dir ip. Kunwi d agdud imsenger
Wid ur numin s Öebbi, akked Umazan iS, ihi, aql a£ Nhegga d ajajiê i ijehliyen
N Öebbi, tagelda n tmurt akked igenwan. Ipsemmiê i win i S ihwan, Ipâuqub win i S ihwan. Öebbi Izga Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu

A d inin wid igwran: "ma tôuêem a d t$eltem, ooet a$ a neddu yidwen". B$an ad bedlen awalen n Öebbi. Ini: "ur teppeddum yidne$, d awez$i. Akka ay d izwar wawal n Öebbi". A d inin: "teêsedm a$"! Xaîi, cwiî kan ay fehhmen

Ini i wid igwran, seg uâôaben n ucluê: "a ppepwanecdem s agdud amaâwaôu, uqsiê; a t tenna$em, ne$ ad anzen. Ma tu$em awal, ad awen Ifk Öebbi arraz igerzen. Ma twexxôem, akken twexxôem uqbel, a kwen Iâaqeb s lqeôê
Ur telli tiyta deg uder$al, ne$ deg urejdal, ne$ deg umuvin. Win iunzen i Öebbi akked Umazan iS, a t Issekcem di leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen. Win iwexxôen, a t Iâaqeb s lqeôê
Ni$ Iôuva Öebbi lmumnin, mi âaqden yidek, seddaw ttejôa. Iéôa i illan deg ulawen nnsen, Issers d fellasen talwit, I$na ten s l$elb aqôib
akked waîas n lerbaê, ara îîfen. Öebbi Izga d Uzmir, d Bab n ûûwab
Iwaââed awen Öebbi a d teîîfem lerbaê aîas. I$awel awen d deg waya. Ikkes fellawen afus n medden. Akken ad yili ussekni i lmumnin, a kwen iawi d ubrid uwqim
Tayev, iwumi ur tezmirem, ihi, Izzi as Öebbi. Öebbi Izga Izmer i yal cci
Lemmer i kwen nnu$en wid ijehlen, ad rewlen, sinna, ur ppafen bab, ne$ asettaô
D tannumi n Öebbi i illan si zik. Ur teppafev abeddel, d awez$i, di tannumi n Öebbi
D Neppa i Ikksen afus nnsen segwen, akked ufus nnwen segsen, di te$zut n Mekka, siwev Iss$elb ikwen fellasen. Öebbi Izga Ipwali ayen txeddmem

D nitni i ijehlen. Swexxôen kwen si Loamaâ n Lêaôam, ugin ad iawev usfel s amkan is. Lemmer maççi d lmumnin, argaz tameîîut, ur ten tessinem, a ten têazem ur teéôim; segsen a d tegwrim di le$ôuô - ni$ Öebbi Issekcam s aêunu S, win i S ihwan - lemmer mfaôaqen, yili, war ccekk, Nesâadda, $ef wid segsen ijehlen, aâaqeb aqeôêan
Mi rran wid ijehlen, aêernun deg ulawen nnsen, aêernun n war tussna, Issers ed Öebbi talwit iS af Umazan iS, akked lmumnin. Iqqen asen awal uêezzeb. Iwata ten, klalen t. Öebbi Izga Iéôa yal cci

Ni$ Issawev Öebbi, i Umazan iS, tamu$li s tidep: war ccekk, a pkecmem Loamaâ n Lêaôam, ma Irad Öebbi, di laman, iqweôôa nnwen ûûeîlen u qeôcen, ur teppagwadem. Iéôa ayen ur teéôim. Ihegga yawen d, ugwar aya, l$elb aqôib
Neppa id Iuznen Amazan iS s nnhaya, akked ddin n tidep, iwakken a t Issifrer $ef ddin meôôa. Iqadd Öebbi d Anagi

Muêemmed d Amazan n Öebbi. Wid illan yides, qesêen ar ijehliyen, êninit garasen. A ten twaliv îîinizen, kennun, ssuturen lfevl s$uô Öebbi akked llza. Ccama nnsen, deg udmawen nnsen, d lateô n lekni. Ata wayen i ten icban di Tuôa akked wayen i ten icban di Linoil: am uâaqqa, iger ed im$i s, isoehd it. Ad iuzur, ad iâaooeô $ef yile$ is. Ippaâoab ifellaêen; i$webben yissen ijehliyen. Iwaââed Öebbi ssmaê akked warraz abarar, i wid degsen iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan
A wid iumnen! Ur zeggwiret zdat Öebbi akked Umazan iS. Ëezzbet i Öebbi. Öebbi, s tidep, Issel, d Amusnaw
A wid iumnen! Ur zzuhriyet tu$ac nnwen, sennig ta$wect n Nnbi. Ur zaââvet $uôes, akken tepzaââvam garawen, mulac ad mêun igiten nnwen, kunwi ur tfaqem
Ih, wid issrusun ûut n ta$wect nnsen, ar Umazan n Öebbi, d wid iwumi Issefsi Öebbi ulawen nnsen, ar uêezzeb. Ad asen ippunefk ssmaê akked warraz abarar
Ih, tegwti n wid ik n issawlen, deffir texxamin, ur pmeyyizen
Lemmer ûbiôen ard teff$ev $uôsen, ppif i nitni. Öebbi Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu
A wid iumnen! Aballa$ ma ibbwi yawen d asali, ppuêeqqeqet, mulac a pvuôôem agdud, war tamusni, a ppu$alem tnedmem deg wayen txedmem

Cfut illa garawen Umazan n Öebbi. Ma issemêes awen deg waîas n lumuô, a pjafem. Maca, Öebbi Issaâzez awen liman, Imelleê it deg ulawen nnwen, Isseôéeg awen tijehli, dd$el, lmaâûegga. Widak d wid ipwanhan
D lfevl s$uô Öebbi, d l$it. Öebbi Iéôa, d Bab n ûûwab

Ma nnu$ent snat n îayfat n lmumnin, êuddet pent. Ma tebw$ev yiwet degsent, $ef tayev, nna$et tin ibwe$ven alamma tevfeô lameô n Öebbi. Ma tevfeô it, ssemûalêet pent, s lmizan. Wezznet. Öebbi Iêemmel wid iwezznen
Lmumnin d atmaten kan i illan. Ssemûalêet atmaten nnwen, êezzbet i Öebbi, amar fellawen aêunu

A wid iumnen! £uôwat ad imaâlek ugdud $ef wayev, ahat d widen i ten yifen. Ne$ tilawin $ef tiyav, ahat d tiden i tent yifen. Ur pqeôôidet iman nnwen, ur pmirgamet s tselleqwbin. Dir it isem n dd$el, anda illa liman. Wid ur nutub ara, d widak ay d imednas

A wid iumnen! Janbet aîas n nnwaya. Ih, nnwaya, tikwal, d abekkav. Ur ppemâassat ara. Ur kkatet wa deg wa. Day ib$u yiwen, degwen, ad içç aksum n gmas lmegget? A t tagwim. Ëezzbet i Öebbi. Ih, Öebbi Issuruf, Ipêunu
A yimdanen! Ni$ Nxelq ikwen si ddker akked nnta. Nerra kwen d igduden, d laâôac, a ppemyussanem. Ihi, ukyis nnwen amxallef, ar Öebbi, d win degwen ipêezziben sennig wiyav. Ih, Öebbi Iéôa, Ippuxebbeô

Nnan uâôaben n ucluê: "numen". Ini: "ur tuminem". Maca init ed: "nunez"; ur ikcim ara liman ar wulawen nnwen. Ma tôuvam Öebbi akked Umazan iS, ur awen Isôuêu acemma seg igiten nnwen. Öebbi, s tidep, Ipsemmiê, Ipêunu
Lmumnin d wid kan iumnen s Öebbi akked Umazan iS, d$a, ur pcukun. Pna$en s wayla nnsen akked yiman nnsen, deg ubrid n Öebbi. D widak ay d imawlan n tidep
Ini: "day ad aS temlem i Öebbi, ddin nnwen"? Öebbi Iéôa i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt. Öebbi Issen yal cci
Rran ak annuz nnsen, d tajmilt. Ini: "ur iyi telli tejmilt deg annuz nnwen. Xaîi, d Öebbi ikwen I$aten mi kwen Inha ar liman, ma d imawlan n tidep ay tellam
Ih, Öebbi Issen tabavnit n tmurt akked igenwan. Öebbi Ipwali ayen txeddmem
S Leqwôan, mucaâ
Xaîi! Wehmen mi ten id iusa uneddaô, segsen. Nnan ijehliyen: "ayagi d lwehma
Ma nemmut, nu$al d akal, ayagi d tu$alin si mbâid
Ni$ Neéôa acêal, segsen, i issenqes wakal. £uône£ Tazmamt iêerrzen
Xaîi! Nekôen tidep, mi ten id tusa, d$a terwi lêala nnsen
Day ur muqlen ara igenni, sennig sen, amek i t Nebna? Ncebbeê it, ur isâi i$isan
Tamurt, Nvelq ip, Nerra degs idurar, Nessem$i d degs tayuga n yal ûûenf amxallef
i tmu$li akked usmekti n yal amdan isteôoiâen
Nesse$li d seg igenni aman iôqan. Nessem$i d yissen leonanat akked uâqqa n tmegra
akked tezdayin ti$wezfanin, s ijeooigen mbabben
d ôôeéq i imdanen. Nessider d yissen tamurt immuten. Akka tanekra
